name: The King's Knight
description:
Story : 

You are the chosen Knight, or perhaps the only one...
You must protect the King and guide him to his throne.

Movements : 

Directionnal arrows or WASD for move.

Space for actions/sword.

XBox 360 Controller supported (may some other gamepad too but not tested).

Context : 

Made during the LudumDare 46 in 72h. Theme was "Keep It Alive".

I'm working alone on this project.

Music is from OpenGameArt.
